data.title: The Remarkable Characters of Arthur Conan Doyle
data.meta_description: The Remarkable Characters of Arthur Conan Doyle. Edited by Joel B. Silver. Though the foundation of his lasting literary legacy is built upon the Sherlock Holmes stories, Sir Arthur Conan Doyle created a number of other unique characters. In celebration of the sesquicentennial of Doyle's birth, a conference and exhibition dealing with these creations was…
data.text:
The Remarkable Characters

of Arthur Conan Doyle.

Edited by Joel B. Silver.

Though the foundation of his lasting literary legacy is built upon the Sherlock Holmes stories, Sir Arthur Conan Doyle created a number of other unique characters. In celebration of the sesquicentennial of Doyle’s birth, a conference and exhibition dealing with these creations was held at Indiana University. This volume focuses on the remarkable characters of Arthur Conan Doyle, and contains contributions made by Doyle experts who presented at the Conference.

Edited by Joel B. Silver, Executive Director of the Lilly Library, this volume examines in detail such luminous characters as Professor Challenger, Brigadier Gerard, and Sir Nigel Loring, in addition to the world’s first consulting detective.

152 pages, 8.5″ x 5.5″ hardcover, December 2013

With 8 illustrations

The Remarkable Characters of Arthur Conan Doyle

$35.00 plus shipping

Sorry – we are SOLD OUT

(but see the Undershaw Set version)

Table of Contents for The Remarkable Characters of Arthur Conan Doyle

Introduction

by Steven T. Doyle

Welcome & Opening Remarks

by Michael F. Whelan

David A. Randall, BSI, and the Formation of the Lilly Library’s Sherlockian Collection

by Joel B. Silver

Arthur Conan Doyle – Setting the Table for Today’s Speakers:

How does ACD compare with his contemporaries in the creation of his characters?

by Dr. Donald J. Gray

Professor Challenger: The Lost World and Other Titles

by Roy E. Pilot

Brigadier Gerard: The Exploits & The Adventures

by Clifford S. Goldfarb

Sir Nigel Loring: The White Company & Sir Nigel

by Mark A. Gagen

Sherlock Holmes

by Leslie S. Klinger

Ladies of the Arthur Conan Doyle Canon

by Susan Rice

Supporting Characters of Arthur Conan Doyle

by Steven T. Doyle

Summation – Has the Conference Case Been Made, or Not?

by Dr. Donald J. Gray

Appendix: Labels for items on exhibition during the conference

Limited Edition Details

A limited edition version of The Remarkable Characters of Arthur Conan Doyle is included in The Undershaw Set.
